name: @metamask/delegator-e2e
description: Tests to validate the Delegation Framework end-to-end.

scripts.setup: yarn build && docker compose up -d && npx tsx src/await-dependencies.ts
scripts.e2etest:full: yarn setup && yarn run-test:full; EXIT_CODE=$?; yarn teardown; exit $EXIT_CODE
scripts.e2etest:smoketest: yarn setup && yarn run-test:smoketest; EXIT_CODE=$?; yarn teardown; exit $EXIT_CODE
